name: typeahead-tagbox
description: A typeahead tagbox with zero dependencies!

scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run scss && npm run size
scripts.transpile: babel src --source-map-include-sources -d dist && npm run compress
scripts.scss: node-sass src/typeahead-tagbox.scss dist/typeahead-tagbox.css --indent-type space --indent-width 4 --source-map-embed true && npm run scss-min
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release: npm run build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
